channel.title: Olifant
channel.description: Olifant is a FOSS client for Mastodon, targeted at elementary OS ecosystem. This is a log of changes, thoughts and actions that are taking place with the project.

item.title: 0.2.1-beta6 submitted for review
item.description:
11 August, 2020 - 0.2.1-beta6 submitted for review

Hello to everyone! I am here with some happier news on Olifant development. I've submitted a new version for review, mostly with bug fixes and improvements on support of pleroma instances. Here are things that were fixed:

  • Fixed loading of accounts, whenever you are signed in into more than one at once
  • Changed the way HTML tags were dropped, now more posts will be able to be displayed non-empty
  • Implemented correct tags parsing of statuses that came from Pleroma
  • Updated visual icons of empty state and application itself (kudos to @hanaral)
  • Dropped authenticated queries at places, where they are not needed
  • Improved loading of images, that caused crashes sometimes

Those may seem like small things, but they are very important for project to be nice for users. I hope you enjoy recent improvements.

Stay safe and tuned with the project!
